meanings.definition: A viral disease affecting poultry and other animals.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was worried about the leucosis spreading among the chickens.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the turkey with leucosis.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken invite the leucosis to the party? For a viral dance-off!
meanings.sent4: The leucosis crept through the flock like a silent predator.
meanings.sent5: The outbreak of leucosis turned the farm into a battleground.

meanings.definition: A type of cancer affecting white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the treatment options for leucosis to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Leucosis can weaken the body's immune system.
meanings.sent3: Why did the white blood cell break up with leucosis? It was too clingy!
meanings.sent4: The leucosis invaded the bloodstream like an army of tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The battle against leucosis was fought bravely by the patient.
